glsa.title: Lookup: Insecure temporary file creation
glsa.synopsis: Lookup uses temporary files in an insecure manner, allowing for a symlink attack.

background.p: Lookup is a search interface to books and dictionnaries for Emacs.

description.p: Tatsuya Kinoshita reported that the ndeb-binary function does not handle temporay files correctly.

impact.p: A local attacker could use a symlink attack to overwrite files with the privileges of the user running Lookup.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Lookup users should upgrade to the latest version:
